item.title: How to Live with Eye Floaters (Without Going Insane)
item.description:
You’re not crazy.
You’re not weak.
You’re just stuck in a visual loop your brain was never prepared for.

This is how to live with eye floaters (without going insane) — from someone who nearly did.

The Breakdown No One Warned You About

Floaters don’t sound like a big deal to most people.

But you know better.

You’ve felt that mental spiral:

  • “I see it again.”
  • “Why won’t it stop?”
  • “I can’t focus.”
  • “Is this forever?”

The worst part?
You feel alone in a battle no one else can see.

item.title: The Eye Floater Survival Guide
item.description:
You don’t need another opinion.
You need a strategy.

This is The Eye Floater Survival Guide — built from experience, backed by neuroscience, and designed to help you live above the dots.

If you’re tired of obsessing, searching, and stressing — this is for you.

⚠️ What a Survival Guide Is (and What It Isn’t)

This isn’t a miracle fix.
It’s not a hack to “delete” floaters in 24 hours.
